member.summary: Extracts the primary media-adress from toc And inserts it into the target string.

The string into which the primary media-adress will be inserted.

member.name: M:Mvc5RQ.Areas.DigitalObjects.Helpers.DigitalObjectHelpers.UpdateDigitalObjectDirectory(System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary)
member.summary: Checks and updates the digital object directory and writes changes to the toc and signature strings. Checks and updates concern the directory name and the names of media and access structure files (f. e. playlist files)
member.param: Id of the RQItem record of the digital object.
The toc string (normally stored in the RQItem record of the digital object).
The signature string (normally stored in the RQItem record of the digital object).
A string dictionary of field names (keys) and field contents (values) of the RQItem record of the digital object.
member.returns: True if update was successful. Updated values in tocString and signatureStr.

member.name: M:Mvc5RQ.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:Mvc5RQ.Controllers.RQItemsController
member.summary: Controller Class for URLs designating RQItem objects
member.remarks: The controller supports URLs of type {serviceId}RQItems/{RQItemId}

member.name: M:Mvc5RQ.Controllers.RQItemsController.RQItemList(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Controller action answering GET http-requests for RQItems
member.remarks: The action reacts to URLs of type "~/RQItems" | "~/{serviceId}/RQItems". The action response is filtered by the ActionFilterAttributes "EnableJson" and "EnableXml": If the GET request contains dataType=application/json | text/json or dataType=application/xml | text/xml the action response is generated by class "JsonResult2" or "XmlResult" of "MvpRestApiLib". In both cases the client is responsible to render the xml (f. e. by XSLT). Otherwise the action response is transformed to text/html on the server according to the value of parameters "verb" or "serviceId" respectively.
member.param:
"rqitem" | {username} = name of the requested database as indicated by the requested url. Database "rqitem" contains all rqitems of all users, which may be accessed by current user. Database {username} contains all rqitems of the user named {username}, which may be accessed by current user.
NOTE: The feature is currently not implemented. If implemented, the parameter has to be included in other actions, too.
member.returns: verb == null: The action returns the (empty) RQItems/Index view. verb == New: The action returns an (empty) data entry mask to add a new RQItem. verb == QueryList | BrowseList: The action returns a collection of RQItems as */json, */xml or text/html - the latter generated by the XSLT "RQResultList2RQSorted.xslt" - depending on data types specified in the GET request. If appropriate the query stored in ListView or BrowseView state storage is used. A new query is generated if the query strings or query options differ. serviceId = rq | rqi | mods | oai_dc | srw_dc | info_ofi | pubmed: The action returns a collection of RQItems formatted according to the requested service API as */json, */xml or text/html - the latter generated by the XSLT "RQResultList2RQSorted.xslt" - depending on data types specified in the GET request. The returned collection is the result set pertaining to the query set in parameter queryString, the last query stored in the state storage or - if both are void - to the "recent additions" query.

member.name: M:Mvc5RQ.Controllers.RQItemsController.RQItemList(System.String,System.String,Mvc5RQ.Models.RQItem)
member.summary: Controller action answering POST http-requests to RQItems.
member.param: Accepted values are character strings conforming to the RiQuest query language.

member.name: M:Mvc5RQ.Controllers.RQItemsController.RQItemRecord(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Controller action answering GET http-requests to {serviceId}/RQItems/{rqitemID}.
member.remarks: The action reacts to URLs of type "~/{serviceId}/RQItems/{rqitemID}". The action request is filtered through the ActionFilterAttributes EnableJson and EnableXml: If the client GET request contains dataType=application/json | text/json or dataType=application/xml | text/xml the action response is generated by class JsonResult2 or XmlResult of MvpRestApiLib. In both cases the client is responsible to render the xml (f. e. by XSLT). Otherwise the action response is tranformed on the server according to the serviceId specified.
member.param: verb == QueryItem: requests a single RQItem of a query result list. verb == BrowseItem: requests a single RQItem of a browse result list. verb == Edit: allows editing of a database record. verb == Copy: allows copying of a database record.
DocNo of RQItem to be returned.
member.returns: The action returns the single RQItem with DocNo=rqitemID as */json, */xml response or text/html response - the latter formatted according to SingleRQItemView - depending on data types specified in the GET request.

member.name: M:Mvc5RQ.Controllers.RQItemsController.UpdateItem(System.String,System.String,Mvc5RQ.Models.RQItem)
member.summary: POST /RQItems. Add a new RQItem.

member.name: M:Mvc5RQ.Controllers.RQItemsController.RQItemDescElement(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Controller action answering GET http-requests to /RQItems/{rqitemID}/{fieldName}.
member.remarks: The action reacts to URLs of type "~/RQItems/{rqitemID}/{fieldName}". The action request is filtered through the ActionFilterAttributes EnableJson and EnableXml: If the client GET request contains dataType=application/json | text/json or dataType=application/xml | text/xml the action response is generated by class JsonResult2 or XmlResult of MvpRestApiLib. In both cases the client is responsible to render the xml (f. e. by XSLT). Otherwise the action response is tranformed on the server according to the XXX-View.
member.param: DocNo of RQItem to be used.
Name of ItemAplphanumeric string with name of ItemDescElement: f. e. Classification
Index of the required subfield of the ItemDescElement.
member.returns: The action returns the ItemDescElement with FieldName = descElementId of RQItem with DocNo=rqitemId as */json, */xml response or text/html response - the latter formatted according to DescElementView - depending on data types specified in the GET request.

member.name: M:Mvc5RQ.Helpers.CultureHelper.GetImplementedCulture(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a valid culture name based on "name" parameter. If "name" is not valid, it returns the default culture "en-US"

member.name: M:Mvc5RQ.Helpers.CultureHelper.GetDefaultCulture
member.summary: Returns default culture name which is the first name decalared (e.g. en-US)

member.name: M:Mvc5RQ.Helpers.StateStorage.GetQueryFromState(System.String,Mvc5RQ.Areas.UserSettings.UserState.States)
member.summary: Builds the actual query.
member.param: queryString == null | "" : Rebuilds actual query from stored query state parameters or returns the default query. queryString != null : Builds a new query from queryString and stores it in query state parameters.

stateType == ListViewState : (Re)builds actual query for ListView. stateType == BrowseViewState : (Re)builds actual query for BrowseView. stateType == ItemViewState : (Re)builds actual query for SingleItemView.
